l:dependency.name: Official OWASP ZAP Jenkins Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: The Official OWASP ZAP Jenkins Plugin extends the functionality of the ZAP security tool into a CI Environment.

l:dependency.l:description: Java implementation to access OWASP ZAP API.

l:dependency.name: JDOM
l:dependency.l:description: A complete, Java-based solution for accessing, manipulating, and outputting XML data
